name: Space Jack
description:
You’re a hacker who has snuck onto the USS Perspicacious. You must download as much sensitive data to your flash drive as possible without getting caught. In order to do that, you had to disable the ship’s replicator, which means you’ll have to deliver all the required objects that the crew requests before they get frustrated and report you to security!

Items will come in the pipeline and you’ll need to add them to the cargo hold before the handing out items to the crew. Be careful, though, you have limited space so you’ll need to make sure all the items you need fit in the cargo hold!

How to play

Click on the items coming down the conveyor belt on the right to put them into your cargo hold

Drag and Drop items in your cargo hold on the left on to any crew members that have the matching item pop up in their word bubbles.

If you get it right, they respond with a heart and your stealth level (HP) goes up. Get it wrong or don’t get the correct item to them in time and they get angry and you lose stealth level! 

Stay alive until the timer runs out and you beat the level! Go below 0 stealth and you’re found by the crew and lose the game.

Survive all three levels and you win the game!
